name: SupplierDashboard
notes: Section-based navigation (overview, products, orders, analytics, inventory). Uses KPICard, LineChart, PieChart. Hash-based routing with useDashboardSection.

name: SellerDashboard
notes: Seller-focused dashboard with sales tracking, commission management, and settlement views.

name: AffiliateDashboard
notes: Partner/affiliate dashboard for commission and link tracking.

name: SocialLogin
notes: Social authentication integration with multiple provider support.

name: DynamicComponents
notes: Component registry for dynamic shortcode system. Infrastructure component.

name: MetaField
notes: WordPress meta field rendering template. Dynamic content component.

name: ACFField
notes: Advanced Custom Fields integration template. Dynamic content component.

name: CPTField
notes: Custom Post Type field rendering template. Dynamic content component.

name: CPTList
notes: Custom Post Type list rendering template with query support.

name: ShortcodeProvider
notes: Context provider for shortcode system. Infrastructure component.

name: PresetShortcode
notes: Preset shortcode wrapper component. HOC pattern.

name: ShortcodeRenderer
notes: Main shortcode rendering engine. Infrastructure component.

name: ShortcodeErrorBoundary
notes: Error boundary for shortcode rendering. Infrastructure component with styled error UI.

name: LoginShortcode
notes: Login form with social auth integration. Container with centered layout.

name: SignupShortcode
notes: User registration form with role selection. Centered card layout.

name: AccountShortcode
notes: Customer account management dashboard. Section-based navigation.

name: CartShortcode
notes: Shopping cart with item management and checkout CTA.

name: CheckoutShortcode
notes: Multi-step checkout flow with payment integration.

name: OrderDetailShortcode
notes: Order detail view with tracking and status updates.

name: OrderList
notes: Customer order history list with filtering.

name: OrderDetail
notes: Detailed order view with line items and tracking.

name: Product
notes: Single product detail page with add to cart.

name: ProductGrid
notes: Product listing grid with category filtering. Main-site version.

name: CustomerDashboard
notes: Main customer account dashboard with order history and profile management.

name: Wishlist
notes: Customer wishlist page (R-6-6). Responsive grid layout with product cards.

name: SupplierDashboard
notes: Main-site supplier dashboard with RoleDashboardMenu integration. KPICard, LineChart, PieChart support.

name: SellerDashboard
notes: Main-site seller dashboard with real API integration (Phase PD-1). Commission tracking and settlements.

name: PartnerDashboard
notes: Main-site partner/affiliate dashboard with link tracking and marketing tools.

name: SellerDashboard
notes: Admin view of seller dashboard with pricing management and margin rate tracking. Pricing alerts and settlement management.

name: PlatformStats
notes: Platform-wide statistics for admin. AreaChart, PieChart, BarChart integration. Revenue analytics and user statistics.

name: ProductGrid
notes: E-commerce product grid with dynamic column support and sorting. Responsive grid layout.
